subject: Kentucky Derby
Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Rachel Alexandra (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: The filly Rachel Alexandra is considered to be better than any of the boys set to run at Churchill Downs, but she will take the stage in the Kentucky Oaks on Friday, not the Derby.
snippet: The filly Rachel Alexandra is considered to be better than any of the boys set to run at Churchill Downs, but she will take the stage in the Kentucky Oaks on Friday, not the Derby.
